news_header: Former One Direction singer Liam Payne was found dead after falling from a hotel balcony in Buenos Aires.
news_text: On Wednesday, Buenos Aires police reported that Liam Payne, the former One Direction singer, was found dead after falling from the balcony of his hotel room at the Casa Sur Hotel. Police responded to a call about an aggressive individual possibly under the influence of drugs and alcohol. Payne, 31, fell from the third floor, sustaining fatal injuries. While medics confirmed his death at the scene, authorities are investigating the circumstances surrounding the fall, with conflicting statements about whether it was a suicide or an accident. Fans gathered outside the hotel to pay tribute. Payne had been open about his struggles with alcoholism and had recently attended a concert in Buenos Aires. He rose to fame as part of One Direction, which gained popularity after forming on 'The X Factor' in 2010. After the band's hiatus in 2016, he pursued a solo career, releasing his last single in March. He is survived by a 7-year-old son.
